title: dossier_v1
$comment: Dossier manifest (metadata + artifact paths). Dossier is append-only and is the SSOT for UI and review.

schema_version.description: Schema version discriminator. Must be exactly 'dossier_v1'.

extensions.description: Forward-compatible extension area. Must not be used to override governance/policies.

append_only.description: Must be true. Dossier manifests are append-only.

artifacts.description: Logical artifact name -> path string (relative path recommended).

hashes.description: Optional path -> sha256 mapping for integrity.
